nl.tno.sensorstorm.api.processing

Interface ParticleBatchOperation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Operation, Serializable

    public interface ParticleBatchOperation
extends Operation
    A ParticleBatchOperation performs the processing of particles in a DataParticleBatch, which is produced by a Batcher. A Batcher and a ParticleBatchOperation run together on a SensorStormBolt. Optionally there can be separate instances of the Batcher and the ParticleBatchOperation on the same SensorStormBolt for different values of a field (see SensorStormBolt). A ParticleBatchOperation must have an OperationDeclaration annotation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<? extends DataParticle> execute(DataParticleBatch inputParticleBatch)
      A new DataParticleBatch has arrived for this operation.

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.tno.sensorstorm.api.processing.Operation

        init

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        List<? extends DataParticle> execute(DataParticleBatch inputParticleBatch)
                                     throws OperationException
        A new DataParticleBatch has arrived for this operation. A list containing zero or more particles can be returned to be sent further up into the topology.
        Parameters:
        inputParticleBatch - A batch of one or more data particle to be processed
        Returns:
        Returns a list of zero or more data particles to be sent further up to the topology (null is also allowed)
        Throws:
        OperationException - when an error occurs in the Operation
